mapper.select: select cp.product_id as productId, cp.product_categary as productType, cp.product_name as productName, sum(numbers) as number, count(1) as count, sum(cp.price * cp.number) as amount, cc_order.order_type as orderType from cc_order join cc_product cp on cc_order.id = cp.order_id where cc_order.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and cc_order.user_id = #{userId} group by cp.product_categary, cp.product_name, cc_order.order_type
